00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 #include <l4/re/env>
00023 #include <l4/vcpu/vcpu.h>
00024 
00025 namespace L4vcpu {
00026 
00031 class State
00032 {
00033 public:
00034   State() {}
00035 
00041   explicit State(l4vcpu_state_t v) : _s(v) {}
00042 
00048   void add(unsigned bits) throw()    { _s |= bits; }
00049 
00055   void clear(unsigned bits) throw()  { _s &= ~bits; }
00056 
00062   void set(l4vcpu_state_t v) throw() { _s = v; }
00063 
00064 private:
00065   l4vcpu_state_t _s;
00066 };
00067 
00072 class Vcpu : private l4_vcpu_state_t
00073 {
00074 public:
00078   typedef l4vcpu_irq_state_t Irq_state;
00079 
00083   void irq_disable() throw()
00084   { l4vcpu_irq_disable(this); }
00085 
00090   Irq_state irq_disable_save() throw()
00091   { return l4vcpu_irq_disable_save(this); }
00092 
00097   State *state() throw()
00098   { return reinterpret_cast<State *>(&(l4_vcpu_state_t::state)); }
00099 
00104   State state() const throw()
00105   { return static_cast<State>(l4_vcpu_state_t::state); }
00106 
00111   State *saved_state() throw()
00112   { return reinterpret_cast<State *>(&(l4_vcpu_state_t::saved_state)); }
00113 
00118   State saved_state() const throw()
00119   { return static_cast<State>(l4_vcpu_state_t::saved_state); }
00120 
00130   void irq_enable(l4_utcb_t *utcb, l4vcpu_event_hndl_t do_event_work_cb,
00131                   l4vcpu_setup_ipc_t setup_ipc) throw()
00132   { l4vcpu_irq_enable(this, utcb, do_event_work_cb, setup_ipc); }
00133 
00144   void irq_restore(Irq_state s, l4_utcb_t *utcb,
00145                    l4vcpu_event_hndl_t do_event_work_cb,
00146                    l4vcpu_setup_ipc_t setup_ipc) throw()
00147   { l4vcpu_irq_restore(this, s, utcb, do_event_work_cb, setup_ipc); }
00148 
00158   void halt(l4_utcb_t *utcb, l4vcpu_event_hndl_t do_event_work_cb,
00159             l4vcpu_setup_ipc_t setup_ipc) throw()
00160   { l4vcpu_halt(this, utcb, do_event_work_cb, setup_ipc); }
00161 
00166   void task(L4::Cap<L4::Task> const task = L4::Cap<L4::Task>::Invalid) throw()
00167   { user_task = task.cap(); }
00168 
00173   int is_page_fault_entry()
00174   { return l4vcpu_is_page_fault_entry(this); }
00175 
00180   int is_irq_entry()
00181   { return l4vcpu_is_irq_entry(this); }
00182 
00187   l4_vcpu_regs_t *r() throw()
00188   { return &(l4_vcpu_state_t::r); }
00189 
00194   l4_vcpu_regs_t const *r() const throw()
00195   { return &(l4_vcpu_state_t::r); }
00196 
00201   l4_vcpu_ipc_regs_t *i() throw()
00202   { return &(l4_vcpu_state_t::i); }
00203 
00208   l4_vcpu_ipc_regs_t const *i() const throw()
00209   { return &(l4_vcpu_state_t::i); }
00210 
00217   void entry_sp(l4_umword_t sp)
00218   { l4_vcpu_state_t::entry_sp = sp; }
00219 
00224   void entry_ip(l4_umword_t ip)
00225   { l4_vcpu_state_t::entry_ip = ip; }
00226 
00237   L4_CV static int
00238   ext_alloc(Vcpu **vcpu,
00239             l4_addr_t *ext_state,
00240             L4::Cap<L4::Task> task = L4Re::Env::env()->task(),
00241             L4::Cap<L4Re::Rm> rm = L4Re::Env::env()->rm()) throw();
00242 
00250   static inline Vcpu *cast(void *x) throw()
00251   { return reinterpret_cast<Vcpu *>(x); }
00252 
00260   static inline Vcpu *cast(l4_addr_t x) throw()
00261   { return reinterpret_cast<Vcpu *>(x); }
00262 
00266   void print_state(const char *prefix = "") throw()
00267   { l4vcpu_print_state(this, prefix); }
00268 };
